Text: Region Locked to NTSC-U and J unfortunately
if its an american console it will definitely be NTSC-U. NTSC-J is asia and japan.

Great torrent, quick upload and the game plays perfectly.... I didn't even have to unrar anything! The game isn't the best, they changed the whole game this time. Its more like Forza than any NFS game I've played, the car's don't handle that great but its still fun to play. Much better than NFS Pro Street!

Thanx for the upload...
